availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Theodor Von Hoene (Kenton County, Kentucky, resident)

body.p: Kenton County lumber dealer and tailor. Married to Mary E. Timmerman on May 5, 1857. Father of Mary Von Hoene and Theodore Von Hoene. Tailor in Kenton County in 1850. Lumber merchant in Kenton County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington Ward 5, p. 289A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington Ward 5, p. 785.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records – Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Roll #994027-994058: Kenton County Marriages, p. 16.
Birth and Death Records: Covington, Lexington, Louisville, and Newport – Microfilm (before 1911), KDLA, Roll # 7012980: Covington, Certificates 401-738 (1895), certificate #451, p. 805 of microfilm.
Vital Statistics Original Death Certificates – Microfilm (1911-1964), KDLA, Roll #7029559: All Counties Deaths, 1911-1913, File #21220, p. 232 of microfilm.
Find A Grave, "Theodore “Theo” VonHoene (1828-1896)," Memorial 144673671, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/144673671 (accessed March 31, 2020).
